meanings.definition: Crudites: a dish of raw vegetables served as an appetizer.
meanings.sent1: At the party, the guests enjoyed munching on the colorful crudites.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant always offers a plate of crudites with a tasty dip.
meanings.sent3: The crudites at the picnic looked so fresh, they seemed to smile back at me.
meanings.sent4: The crudites on the platter were like a vibrant garden on the table.
meanings.sent5: The crunch of the crudites was music to my ears.

meanings.definition: Crudites: the vegetables served in a crudites dish.
meanings.sent1: Mom prepared a variety of crudites for the family gathering.
meanings.sent2: The caterer arranged the crudites beautifully on the serving tray.
meanings.sent3: The kids giggled as they pretended the crudites were tiny trees in a forest.
meanings.sent4: The colors of the crudites popped like fireworks on the plate.
meanings.sent5: The freshness of the crudites made them irresistible to everyone.
